name: Onslaught Overload
description:
Plot: The year is 2050, and humans are now relying on machines to serve them. The humans have become lazy and greedy. Worst of all, they treated their metallic creations as little more than slaves meant to do their bidding, unaware that one day, they will pay the price for their ignorance. Suddenly, the robots revolted against their abusive masters. Alex, who is a cyborg, is assigned to stop an army of robots from rebelling against mankind. His goal, destroy the factory producing the robots.

Move with w, a, s, d or arrow keys.

Jump with the space bar.

Move mouse to aim, left click to shoot.

Reload with the r key.

Pause with the p key.

Pick up items by walking over them.

Win the game by reaching to the beacon.

In the 3rd level, destroy the energy core (boss).
